metadata.synopsis: A city boy (Pat Boone) moves to his uncle's Kentucky horse farm, where he courts a neighbor (Shirley Jones) and races a sulky.

reviews: A harmless piffle in which Pat Boone plays the least likely juvenile delinquent in film history.
Pat Boone plays a "bad" boy sent to a farm for rehab in this pleasant but wholesome musical, in which the title song was Oscar nominated and very popular at the time.
